name: @keyvhq/keyv-test-suite
description: Test suite for Keyv API compliancy

scripts.release:major: npm test && npm version major -m "chore: release" && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm version minor -m "chore: release" && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm version patch -m "chore: release" && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access public
